H0.text: To perform repetitive tasks is the best use of a robot in producing an automobile among the 27 options.

H1.text: To determine the trunk space is the best use of a robot in producing an automobile, among the 27 possible options.

H2.text: To demonstrate passenger comfort is the best use of a robot in producing an automobile, among the 27 following options.

H3.text: To perform quality control inspections is the best use of a robot in producing an automobile, among the 27 options.

A4.text: Some robots are programmed to faithfully carry out specific actions over and over again (repetitive actions) without variation and with a high degree of accuracy.

A5.text: Typical applications of robots include ... product inspection, and testing; all accomplished with high endurance, speed, and precision.

A8.text: Quality assurance includes management of the quality of raw materials, assemblies, products and components, services related to production, and management, production and inspection processes.
